title: Compiler panics when trying to run unit tests: error: incremental compilation: could not create session directory lock file: Permission denied (os error 13)

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
## Scenario
* run unit tests in the [jailer](https://github.com/firecracker-microvm/firecracker/tree/master/jailer/src) crate in Firecracker.

## Preconditions

```bash
pwd
$FIRECRACKER_DIR/jailer/src/

rustc --version --verbose
rustc 1.30.1 (1433507eb 2018-11-07)
binary: rustc
commit-hash: 1433507eba7d1a114e4c6f27ae0e1a74f60f20de
commit-date: 2018-11-07
host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu
release: 1.30.1
LLVM version: 8.0
```

## Result
* compiler panic. Looks like a permissions issue; some of the files in my source tree were owned by `root`.
* expected result: compiler shouldn't panic.

## Workaround

* `chown`'ed my source tree.

## Details

```bash
RUST_BACKTRACE=1 cargo test --no-fail-fast --verbose
```
```rust
       Fresh semver-parser v0.7.0
       [...]
   Compiling jailer v0.11.0 ($FIRECRACKER_DIR/jailer)                                                                                     
       Fresh tempfile v3.0.5                                                                                                                                                              
     Running `rustc --crate-name jailer jailer/src/lib.rs --color always --crate-type lib --emit=dep-info,link -C debuginfo=2 -C metadata=56ae28d515e68ca2 -C extra-filename=-56ae28d515e68ca2 --out-dir $FIRECRACKER_DIR/target/x86_64-unknown-linux-musl/debug/deps --target x86_64-unknown-linux-musl -C incremental=$FIRECRACKER_DIR/target/x86_64-unknown-linux-musl/debug/incremental -L dependency=$FIRECRACKER_DIR/target/x86_64-unknown-linux-musl/debug/deps -L dependency=$FIRECRACKER_DIR/target/debug/deps --extern clap=$FIRECRACKER_DIR/target/x86_64-unknown-linux-musl/debug/deps/libclap-9d337ac7aff1dcfe.rlib --extern fc_util=$FIRECRACKER_DIR/target/x86_64-unknown-linux-musl/debug/deps/libfc_util-4aa1aff69e073b84.rlib --extern libc=$FIRECRACKER_DIR/target/x86_64-unknown-linux-musl/debug/deps/liblibc-d4e62b6c26d7d604.rlib --extern regex=$FIRECRACKER_DIR/target/x86_64-unknown-linux-musl/debug/deps/libregex-11abdc03e9536e21.rlib --extern serde=$FIRECRACKER_DIR/target/x86_64-unknown-linux-musl/debug/deps/libserde-d84e1643de65719d.rlib --extern serde_derive=$FIRECRACKER_DIR/target/debug/deps/libserde_derive-85176560f80702f0.so --extern serde_json=$FIRECRACKER_DIR/target/x86_64-unknown-linux-musl/debug/deps/libserde_json-2126c3dd83c88b62.rlib --extern sys_util=$FIRECRACKER_DIR/target/x86_64-unknown-linux-musl/debug/deps/libsys_util-a958d09d664e842f.rlib`
     Running `rustc --crate-name jailer jailer/src/lib.rs --color always --emit=dep-info,link -C debuginfo=2 --test -C metadata=7cbecc304c1a651a -C extra-filename=-7cbecc304c1a651a --out-dir $FIRECRACKER_DIR/target/x86_64-unknown-linux-musl/debug/deps --target x86_64-unknown-linux-musl -C incremental=$FIRECRACKER_DIR/target/x86_64-unknown-linux-musl/debug/incremental -L dependency=$FIRECRACKER_DIR/target/x86_64-unknown-linux-musl/debug/deps -L dependency=$FIRECRACKER_DIR/target/debug/deps --extern clap=$FIRECRACKER_DIR/target/x86_64-unknown-linux-musl/debug/deps/libclap-9d337ac7aff1dcfe.rlib --extern fc_util=$FIRECRACKER_DIR/target/x86_64-unknown-linux-musl/debug/deps/libfc_util-4aa1aff69e073b84.rlib --extern libc=$FIRECRACKER_DIR/target/x86_64-unknown-linux-musl/debug/deps/liblibc-d4e62b6c26d7d604.rlib --extern regex=$FIRECRACKER_DIR/target/x86_64-unknown-linux-musl/debug/deps/libregex-11abdc03e9536e21.rlib --extern serde=$FIRECRACKER_DIR/target/x86_64-unknown-linux-musl/debug/deps/libserde-d84e1643de65719d.rlib --extern serde_derive=$FIRECRACKER_DIR/target/debug/deps/libserde_derive-85176560f80702f0.so --extern serde_json=$FIRECRACKER_DIR/target/x86_64-unknown-linux-musl/debug/deps/libserde_json-2126c3dd83c88b62.rlib --extern sys_util=$FIRECRACKER_DIR/target/x86_64-unknown-linux-musl/debug/deps/libsys_util-a958d09d664e842f.rlib --extern tempfile=$FIRECRACKER_DIR/target/x86_64-unknown-linux-musl/debug/deps/libtempfile-43dfcf4fe38164a5.rlib`
```
